instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00244: What is 820-00244? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PP3V3_S5: What is PP3V3_S5? PP3V3_S5 is a 3.3v power rail when the system is in an S5 soft off power state.
definitions.PP5V_S4: What is PP5V_S4? PP5V_S4 is a 5v power rail present when the machine is in an S4 suspend to disk state..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a macbook retina 12" not turning on ppbus 8.65v
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a board, no water damage or liquid damage, 

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>=8.65v
<SIGNAL>PP3V3_S5</SIGNAL>=3.3v
<SIGNAL>PP5V_S4</SIGNAL>= 0v
<SIGNAL>PPVCORE_SUS_PCH</SIGNAL>=1v


what to do , what to chk !!!!pls help, it was working , i changed the eDP Display Connector,(i was broken )  J8500,


no not turning on, and getting following voltage

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a macbook retina 12" not turning on ppbus 8.65v
threads.message: Could be anything. Shorted out stuff around the connector? Too much heat and reflowed half the board?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a macbook retina 12" not turning on ppbus 8.65v
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 34112"]Could be anything. Shorted out stuff around the connector? Too much heat and reflowed half the board?[/QUOTE]

i didnt use hot air, use only iron,

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a macbook retina 12" not turning on ppbus 8.65v
threads.message: Shorted out something under/near the connector? Picture of said connector?
